member.summary: Gets the object that will be persisted to the database.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Comments.ICommentCreatingEvent
member.summary: This event is raised during the creation of object, before the transaction is completed. Throwing exception by the handler will cancel the action and rollback the current transaction.
member.remarks: Note that changes of the object properties should be persisted to the database.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Comments.ICommentCreatedEvent
member.summary: This event is raised after an object is created.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Comments.ICommentUpdatingEvent
member.summary: This event is raised during object update, before the transaction is completed. Throwing exception by the handler will cancel the action and rollback the current transaction.
member.remarks: Note that changes of the updated object properties should be persisted to the database.

member.name: P:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Comments.ICommentUpdatingEvent.OriginalItem
member.summary: Gets the object as it is before the update.

member.summary: This event is raised after an object is updated.

member.name: T:Telerik.Sitefinity.Services.Comments.ICommentDeletingEvent
member.summary: This event is raised during the deletion of object, before the transaction is completed. Throwing exception by the handler will cancel the action and rollback the current transaction.
